about_the_game:
【Game Overview】


You are a college freshman who loves watching VTuber live streams. By chance, you entered Ooyama Agency and became a manager, meeting three unique VTubers. Over the next year, please walk alongside them towards the path of realizing dreams!
In addition to working hard to earn money and manage channels, you can also leverage your reliable charm as a manager to gradually enter the hearts of the three girls, and even develop a relationship with them that goes beyond "VTuber and manager"!

【Game Features】








- Exquisite fully animated H scenes
- 25 H scenes
- More than 130 CG variations including differentials
- Three-line parallel development system
- Full voice acting for the female lead
- Dress-up system
- Over 100,000 words of text

【Game System】




—Rich Development System—

Players need to arrange the weekly schedules for the three heroines according to their abilities and goals within a year in the game, and pay attention to their physical and mental health. If players fail to relieve their stress in time, irreversible and significant consequences will follow...
Special Date System: Fulfilling specific conditions before a designated date, such as the heroine's birthday, Christmas, or Tanabata, can trigger special storylines...!?



—Ultra-realistic Live Streaming Scenes—

With Live2D model recorded with real people and realistic live streaming room settings, players can experience ultra-realistic live streaming.
During the live stream, VTubers will encounter various unexpected events, and players need to provide appropriate action suggestions based on the heroines' characteristics!







—Master of Time Management—

To synchronize the development of three VTubers, you need to allocate action points wisely and choose to witness the growth of which female protagonist.
Each training session is accompanied by corresponding mini-games, and when you perform well, the VTubers can also grow rapidly!

【Character Introduction】




Real Name: Kuronuma Yui
VTuber Name: Lilith Succubus
Age: 25
Height: 180 cm
Cup Size: G
Birthday: July 12

An introverted and socially anxious otaku girl, she is a VTuber who is particularly outspoken and bold during live broadcasts, craving fan attention and valuing interaction, she has cultivated many true fans. Her favorite is the popular VTuber of Ooyama Agency, Inuyama Ai, whose cheerful and confident demeanor she admires.
The reason for her inferiority complex and introverted personality is a certain event she keeps hidden deep within her heart. During sex, her personality becomes particularly assertive and bold; she likes to be in a dominant position and enjoys trying out different props and scenarios...





Real Name: Hinata Junko
VTuber Name: Hyou Aoi
Age: 21
Height: 159 cm
Cup Size: F
Birthday: August 20

A sunny and outgoing college freshman hottie. She is a sisterly chat-type VTuber, and fans see her as a healing spirit little sun, entering the agency to escape unknown predicaments.
Not very familiar with otaku culture, she sometimes makes funny mistakes, so she is happy to be educated by the audience, but sometimes she is intentionally taught naughty things. Although she looks like a hottie, she is unexpectedly very pure?...





Real Name: Inoue Sanae
VTuber Name: Sister Trisha
Age: 35
Height: 166 cm
Cup Size: H
Birthday: November 25

A seriously clumsy development-type VTuber who earnestly replies to every viewer's comments and opinions. Their unique personality charm has attracted many caring, directive-type fans, and their dedication to improving in areas where they are not proficient is moving. Despite being not young, they chose to become a VTuber to fulfill their past dreams.
She appears to be a mature married woman living a stable and smooth life, but inside, she seems to be suffering due to certain reasons. Her desire is actually very strong, craving stimulating and intense sex experiences...

content_descriptors.notes: All characters are over 20 years old, including sex, masturbate,nude content.

name: V-LOVER!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 / AMD Radeon HD 6870 DirectX 版本: 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon HD 6870 DirectX 版本: 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound

short_description: By a twist of fate, you have become a manager at a VTuber agency, tasked with the important mission of nurturing three VTubers. In order to help them reach the pinnacle of the VTuber world, you not only need to carefully manage their schedules but also fulfill their various needs...!?
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
